import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { producDetails } from '../actions/productAction.js' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const producDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetail ) const { loading, error, product } = producDetails useEffect(() => { // useEffect executa imediamente quando o componente é chamado dispatch(producDetails()) }, [dispatch]) return ( <>

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
